front.title: A Framework for QoS Support in Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: This draft describes a solution to perform QoS signaling alongthe new network path, when mobile node using Mobile IPv6acquires a new care-of address. The solution is based on thedefinition of new option called QoS OBJECT OPTION. This optionis included in the hop-by-hop extension header of certainpackets, preferably the ones carrying binding messages,propagating between mobile node and correspondent nodeor between mobile node and regional mobility agent(s).
